string.text: of the camp behind the vehicle graveyard
at the camp behind the vehicle graveyard
of the swamp by the ruins
at the swamp by the ruins
of the passage to the Bar
at the passage to the Bar
of the checkpoint behind the village
at the checkpoint behind the village
just recently appeared in the Zone
not the first time in the Zone
was one of the best in the Zone
was an expert in his field
Lucky didn't let it get close, otherwise
Thought to run away - but nowhere to go. So,
lucky didn't let it get close, otherwise
thought to run away - but nowhere to go. So,
Instead of legs - a gruesome mess
Dropped his PDA shortly before, otherwise I couldn't have identified him.
Couldn't kill the bastard, so guys, watch out.
Seems they fired from a pistol
seems they fired from a pistol
Looks like they fired a rifle
looks like they fired a rifle
Stuffed with lead like a turkey
Turned the poor guy into a sieve
stuffed with lead like a turkey
turned the poor guy into a sieve
Looks like they fired an assault rifle
looks like they fired an assault rifle
Looks like a grenade launcher banged
Eh, what great weather! Hard to believe it's the Zone...
The weather is super after all. Would be nice to sunbathe :)

The little cloud hides behind the forest,
The sun looks down from the heavens.
So clean,
Kind and radiant...

Eh, getting lyrical for some reason...
It's getting gloomy. Hope it doesn't rain...
Seems like it's gonna rain. And we just got ready to go for loot...
And who was saying the weather would be good?
Wow, that's gonna be one hell of a storm.
Did you hear the thunder? That was a loud bang.
We have quite a light show here - lightning striking non-stop.
And the sun finally came out.
I told you - the weather would be good.
Ooh, that's great! All the clouds cleared up.
Looks like we won't see the sun for a long time.
I told you - there would be rain.

And once again rains crashed down on the earth,
And drops tear apart the silence.
Around water flows with murky foam,
Washing away the withered foliage.
Wow, that's gonna be one hell of a storm.
Did you hear the thunder? That was a loud bang.
We have quite a light show here - lightning striking non-stop.
And the sun finally came out.
I told you - the weather would be good.
Ooh, that's great! All the clouds cleared up.
Good thing the rain stopped at least.
Looks like the rain is over.
Don't rejoice that the rain stopped - look at the clouds.
Who knows, will this rain ever end?

The drumming of rain on dark roofs - 
Ringing of castanets. 
A quiet rustle barely audible. 
In the gray smoke of cigarettes 
Aromas dissolved 
Of water pouring from the sky... 
And under the ringing peals 
The world is woven from emptiness. 

Eh... And I used to write serious poetry once.
Thunder rumbling. Means it's not just rain - it's a storm.
Did you hear the thunder? That was a loud bang.
And the sun finally came out.
I told you - the weather would be good.
Ooh, that's great! All the clouds cleared up.
Looks like the storm is over.
Don't rejoice that the storm is over - look at the clouds.
No lightning visible. Looks like the storm is ending.
I wonder, will the storm ever stop?
Damn it! Just as you get ready to go - it starts raining buckets immediately.
Eh, what great weather! Hard to believe it's the Zone...
The weather is super after all.
And who was saying the weather would be good?
Wow, that's gonna be one hell of a storm.
Did you hear the thunder? That was a loud bang.
We have quite a light show here - lightning striking non-stop.
I told you - the weather would be good.
Ooh, that's great! All the clouds cleared up.
Looks like we won't see a clear sky for a long time.
I told you - there would be rain.

And once again rains crashed down on the earth,
And drops tear apart the silence.
Around water flows with murky foam,
Washing away the withered foliage.
Wow, that's gonna be one hell of a storm.
Did you hear the thunder? That was a loud bang.
We have quite a light show here - lightning striking non-stop.
I told you - the weather would be good.
Ooh, that's great! All the clouds cleared up.
Good thing the rain stopped at least.
Looks like the rain is over.
Don't rejoice that the rain stopped - look at the clouds.
Who knows, will this rain ever end?

The drumming of rain on dark roofs - 
Ringing of castanets. 
A quiet rustle barely audible. 
In the gray smoke of cigarettes 
Aromas dissolved 
Of water pouring from the sky... 
And under the ringing peals 
The world is woven from emptiness. 

Eh... And I used to write serious poetry once.
Thunder rumbling. Means it's not just rain - it's a storm.
Did you hear the thunder? That was a loud bang.
I told you - the weather would be good.
Ooh, that's great! All the clouds cleared up.
Looks like the storm is over.
Don't rejoice that the storm is over - look at the clouds.
No lightning visible. Looks like the storm is ending.
I wonder, will the storm ever stop?
Damn it! Just as you get ready to go - it starts raining buckets immediately.
$level a helicopter flew by. Keep your heads down, I don't know what their orders are.
Right. $level a helicopter just flew over me. People, $carefull_z!

$level a helicopter flew over me $when_a. Why the hell are they flying around now? Haven't heard of any planned sweeps or operations here, and my sources are reliable. Something serious happened. $carefull_a.
$carefull_a! It's hot at $level right now - a chopper is ironing the area.
Heard military chatter - their chopper pinned someone down good. $level.
$carefull_a! $level a helicopter is circling. Looks like they're searching for someone.
Damn it... $level a chopper is strafing someone. Unlucky guy.
$carefull_a! Take cover, damn it! A chopper is searching for someone here, if they spot anyone in passing, you won't make it out alive!
$carefull_a! $level, looks like some idiot decided to shoot at a helicopter. He's a corpse.
Heard military chatter - someone really lit up their helicopter. $level.
$level a helicopter is hit. Backup will appear now...
$level a helicopter got hit hard, hope they don't start a raid.
Oh, crap. $level a helicopter was shot at, and substantially too, their engine caught fire. They are swearing on the air and falling somewhere to the side!
$level observing a helicopter, it's hit! Going down! Someone really nailed it, holy crap!
Some suicidal maniac shot enough to hit a helicopter! $level! Well, frankly... that's something.
Heard military chatter - their helicopter was shot down. $level.
The military are swearing so hard my ears are curling up. Imagine that... guess they don't lose helicopters every day.
Oh, damn... what an explosion. Someone hit the helicopter seriously. $level.
Apparently, nothing even remained of the pilots. $level. Imagine that, destroying a helicopter like that. Yeah...
$when_a saw a helicopter. Turned around and flew away somewhere. $level.
Damn... The swearing on the military channel is heavy right now. $level a helicopter was shot at. They have some raid there, but they are ordering an urgent return.
"Mayday"! $level got into a mess, can't walk. Won't last long...
SOS! $level pinned down, medkits ran out, almost no ammo. Guys, help out...

"Mayday"! I don't have...

%c[default]Potap
%c[default]I managed to catch the signal source. $level.
Help out! $level pinned down! Won't hold out long!
Damn, how many of them are here... Guys, I won't last alone! Whoever can, move to me! I am at $level.
I have big problems. Very big. $level. If no one is nearby, I won't be with you soon. Guys, help out.
Damn, it's an ambush here! "Mayday"! I am at $level, help out!
Son of a bitch! So many of them here! Help, I can't handle them alone! $level still fighting back for now.
Intercepted chatter of some bastards, they have an ambush on a stalker. $level.
Help! Low on ammo, meds - even less. Arrived at the point. Apparently, they were waiting for me here! $level now, won't be able to fight back for long!
$level picked up a "Mayday"! $name. Moving to coordinates, those willing to help - help.
SOS! $level pinned down, carrying a wounded $name! Guys, help out...
Attention everyone! $name got into trouble. $level, my PDA is catching an SOS from there. Whoever is nearby - save them.
Help out, damn you! They'll tear everything off us here! $level pinned down! Damn, is anyone nearby?!
Help! We have serious problems, whoever can - help out! We are $level.
Hell, we have big problems here! We have a wounded man, $name, we won't last long! We are sitting $level.
Came to the coordinates on "Mayday", $name sent it. Damn, they were waiting for us here! Help out, we won't last long!
SOS! $level fell into an ambush, holding for now, but I don't think it will last long. Need help, would be grateful.
Intercepted a plea for help from some group of stalkers. Their transmitter is crappy, just static. All I managed to do is get a bearing. The signal source is $level. Whoever is nearby - help out.
Guys, help out, we have serious problems here, there's a wounded man! We are located $level.

Met the Swamp Doctor... well, kinda met him... he healed me a bit from blind dog bites, but that doesn't matter. What matters is he warned about an Emission. Says the Emission will happen $when, so everyone into your holes!
Dropped by the ecologists at Yantar. They warned that according to their measurements, an Emission will happen $when.
Sakharov warned that an Emission will happen $when. So look for a cozy hole.
Kruglov warned that an Emission will happen $when. So look for a cozy hole.
Guys, my equipment started going off the scale. Most likely, an Emission will happen $when.
The beasts are getting restless. Emission soon. Most likely $when.
Find a reliable shelter, Emission is $when.
Sakharov says his equipment gives an approximate estimate that the Emission is $when.
When I was at Sakharov's, he mentioned an Emission. It will be $when.
I was informed that the Emission is $when. My channels are reliable, so most likely, that's how it is. Careful out there.
Emission will be $when. Telling you for sure.
$who stopped by here, left something for you. Pick it up if you're around.
$who thanked you. Said you killed $target. Left a package with me for you.
$who said thanks to you for $target. Come in.
Marked One, $who stopped by here. Joyful, grinning from ear to ear. Handed over a package, says it's gratitude for you.
$who stopped by here and passed something for you. If you're nearby - come in, pick up your goods. Benefactor.
Yes, Marked One... $who came by here, asked to pass on his gratitude. Left a package, pick it up if you're around.
$who stopped by here, left something for you. Pick it up if you're around.
$who thanked you. Said you killed $target. Left a package with me for you.
$who said thanks to you for $target. Come in.
Marked One, some subject stopped by here, says he's looking for you. Was upset when he found out you weren't in. He handed me something in gratitude for some job. Anyway, come in.
$who stopped by here, left a delivery for you. Says you helped him a lot, and he doesn't forget things like that. Pick it up when you have time.
Selling $item. Waiting for buyers at $level. Better hurry - lots of interested folks.
Giving away $item to good hands. Not for free, of course. $level. Look for me there if interested.
$level I can offer many interesting things. For example, $item.
Selling a wonderful thing - $item. Currently stopped at $level. If interested - meet there.
I have $item. We can haggle at $level.
Selling a useful thing like $item. Can discuss the price at $level.
If anyone is interested in buying $item - selling for an appropriate price. $level.
Will give away $item for reasonable money. Waiting for buyers at $level.
Selling $item. You'll meet me at $level. Hurry up, or I'll change my mind.
Anyone interested in $item? At $level you have a great opportunity to buy this cool thing.
$level waiting for those willing to buy $item. Price is appropriate, but it's worth it.
Selling $item for a reasonable price. $level. If money is tight, can trade for something valuable.
Advise you to hurry. Selling $item at $level.
$level giving $item into good hands. For money, of course.
If anyone is interested - can sell $item. Wonderful thing. Currently located at $level.
If anyone is interested, selling $item. Excellent thing. You will find me at $level.
Guys, strange things happen at night... ever heard the chatter?
Yeah. And it's unclear who it is... what is happening there? Some experiments, operations... and we know nothing, only bits leak out...
I think it's better you don't know everything. You'll sleep sounder.
Penetrated the southern tunnel of the Object. Goes down, will soon descend underground. The Red Forest is visible from the windows. Quiet so far.
We are losing radio contact with you. Place a remote relay at the exit or continue transmission via text, as you are doing now.
Roger. Yes, close the channel. We don't need extra listeners, right?

...[transmission error] block the tunnel, split into groups and sweep the underground part of the Object. Maintain constant communication. If silence from at least one of the departed groups - everyone return.
Falcon, what... [transmission error] ...that may appear? During the last descent, an entire recon group disappeared.

As for protective measures, then creatu... [transmission error] ...inhabiting here, then... [transmission error] ...not detected. Do not go far. Point of no return is two hours. Upon expiration, we leave.
Ajax, report in immediately. I repeat, immediately. We must depart in six minutes, before it starts.
The test subjects demonstrate remarkable intelligence. What do you think about this, Andrei Ilyich?
Indeed, curious behavior... especially at such radiation doses... Stop! Switch to the encrypted communication channel immediately! What the hell?!
Candid, our equipment is acting strangely... all dosimeters and sensors are silent, and Sergey's PDA broke down... communication is dying too... what are the orders?
Get out of there! Get out! Faster, damn it!

Yes, found it. Part of the equipment is still intact. Most cameras are disabled, but motion sensors are still working... hold on, there is a schematic with indication here... you are here, and... damn, what is that?! Run, a group of objects is moving very fast towards you from the northern corridors! Hell, more! In the ventilation shafts... [error, transmission interrupted]
Raise power by ten percent. Yes, and tell the signalers to switch to another channel... this one seems unencrypted...

Colonel, the helicopter with the experimental suppression unit crashed in the Radar area an hour ago. Immediately, I repeat, immediately send a group to the crash site. I don't care about the means. You will be provided with all necessary equipment.
Enable encryption, damn you! We will be on site in 12 hours.
People, so, it's dawning - think we can move out already, won't run into much now, not like at night.
Dawn has broken. Moving out, it's more or less safe now.
Guys, wake up! It's morning already!
Eh, guys! Finally getting light, I'm tired of trembling with fear in the dark. Better to tremble... in the light of day...
Can anyone hear me? A group of our guys went missing last night. Were supposed to return by morning from Agroprom. Still not here. We are setting out for a search in an hour. Join us.
Damn, who invented morning... We drank all night... Cook, the bastard, brought fake vodka from somewhere again... "Freedom", sleep on... the raid on "Duty" base can wait...
Guys, you should see the sunrise here at Yantar. It's something... Both scary and beautiful... And snork corpses drift so coolly in the lake surface sparkling in the morning sun... Romance...
Damn, guys, do what you want, but I'm not going for loot today anymore. Night is coming soon...
Nah, I'm not going anywhere anymore. It's late, all sorts of filth will crawl out soon...
Right, sunset already... start returning slowly, it's unsafe in the Zone now.
Go on, guys... into the night... against bloodsuckers... alone. Daredevils, damn.
Well? Who's coming with me to take down a pack of pseudodogs? I'm afraid to sleep in the tent at night, what if that... dark one... asks for water again... Better to wander somewhere...
Moon will rise soon... Damn, not making it to the camp... Guys, anyone nearby? I feel some beast is already stalking me.
Attention everyone! Scientists report suspicious mutant activity at Yantar tonight. Everyone stay in camps.
Right. What kind of crap was that?
Damn... what goes on here at night?
Appeared on an open channel again. Happens.
Forgot to enable encryption? Well, well...
Damn it... it's creepy enough at night as it is...
Happens. I scanned frequencies once, stumbled upon military stalker chatter... you know, better you don't know everything happening here. You'll sleep sounder.
Who is that? Military? Scientists? Jokers? Or someone... else?
Arranging things at night... on the quiet, so to speak...
Yeah. Actually, it's rare for them to forget to close frequencies.
Yeah... this isn't tales about the dark one... some horror is happening right under our noses...
Just found a bloody corpse near the abandoned farm in Cordon. Looks like bloodsucker work.
Oh, those tushkanos! Fed up! A shitload of them ran into the rookie village again, so whoever is afraid of rodents, don't poke your nose here for now.
Saw a pseudodog not far from the camp in Cordon under the bridge. Everyone heading there, be careful.
A pseudogiant wandered into Cordon, the bastard, and blocked the passage to Garbage. Whoever can, please, kill this beast.
A bloodsucker tore apart a group of bandits at the vehicle graveyard in Garbage. Everyone be careful.
Saw a pack of fleshes near the entrance to the catacombs at Agroprom.
A fire poltergeist roasted a group of stalkers at the factory at Agroprom.
Just saw some beast looking like a bloodsucker on the expanses of Agroprom.
A pseudogiant was spotted near the rusty bus at Agroprom, sat resting, the bastard, evidently came from afar.
Intercepted a conversation of military from Agroprom. In short, they called for backup: a hefty pack of dogs attacked their base.
Just saw a pseudogiant take down two boars near the swamp in Dark Valley. A sight not for the faint-hearted.
Pseudodogs dragged a stalker away at the homestead in Army Warehouses. Guess a mess will start now.
A pseudogiant sat down for a rest near the former bus stop at Army Warehouses.
Yesterday night a stalker saw about two-three more bloodsuckers migrating to the bloodsucker village. Creepy!
A large pack of fleshes rushed through the "Freedom" minefield. Half died, and the rest are still loitering there in the open.
Snorks were spotted at the swamp at Army Warehouses, they didn't specify the amount. Don't get caught.

Caught a message from some stalkers asking for help... screaming they ran into a chimera. $where. When I finally found them there, they were already dead. And you know... it wasn't a chimera that killed them, for sure... they are all covered in burns, like from an "Electro"... anyway, be careful. Some new filth has appeared here, most likely.

Stalkers! Several hours ago "Duty" suffered heavy losses from unknown beasts. Anyone with information on mutations that occurred in Zone creatures after the last Emission, please help. The attack happened $where...

Peregrine, observing a firefight. $where... a group of stalkers is engaging a large mutant... can't make it out... going down. Yes, switch the channel to another frequency, this one is being monitored...

"Duty" reports some new variety of chimeras. Their raid failed... $where they went to clear a mutant lair, and suddenly... anyway, the squad was torn apart in a few seconds. And it's definitely not a normal chimera... it can't... so many people at once...

Ecologists say something is wrong with chimeras after the Emission... they started some strange new mutations... careful. Yes, if it helps anyone, saw a chimera a while ago. It was running $where, the beast. God knows if it's normal or not...
Stalkers! $where, according to our data, appeared... an unusual beast. Most likely, a new variety of chimera, mutated under the influence of the last Emission. Be careful.

...think that ultimately, this could lead to completely unnecessary casualties? Come on! Stalkers die constantly from various Zone manifestations anyway, and those lucky enough to remain alive prefer not to ask for details on how their... colleagues die. So what now? I don't think the appearance of some new beast will cause a serious reaction from stalkers. They've seen worse $where.
Confirming information about the beast appearance. Send a quad with heavy weapons. My people won't be able to do anything $where.

Aw hell... alright, listen. $where I stumbled upon a military patrol. Looks, to put it mildly, not great... hard to even call it a patrol. Unless hanging guts on trees counts. Only identified by uniforms... Anyway, here's the thing. First, they might send a punitive raid here or, worse, a chopper. Second, which worries me much more, some new beast has appeared here. Anything I know isn't capable of tearing apart patrols so efficiently.
$where observing a chimera. Just laid down a group of stalkers. So if you want to wander here, think twice. Turning around and leaving is definitely better than lying here like these poor guys.
$level $when_z almost said goodbye to life: $meet_z a $class. $hard_a $killed_z.
Explaining for the slow ones: if asked to lower your weapon, better lower it, your face will stay intact. Some guy just came here...
What kind of people! Until you punch them in the face - they don't understand that the gun must be lowered...
Alright then. One more woodpecker approaches me with a raised weapon - won't punch the face anymore. Will kill on the spot.
of the checkpoint by the tunnel
at the checkpoint by the tunnel
checkpoint by the passage to Warehouses
of the checkpoint by the passage to Warehouses
at the checkpoint by the passage to Warehouses
of the helicopter in the forest
near the helicopter in the forest
of the house behind the bridge
in the house behind the bridge
Truly I tell you: Emission is
Find a reliable shelter, Emission is
Sakharov says his equipment gives an approximate estimate that the Emission is
When I was at Sakharov's, he spoke about an Emission. It will be
Everyone into holes! Emission will be
Attention! The eggheads report - Emission is
, how can that be! There was one just recently!
! Ah you son of a bitch! Lying probably!
! Mother! Couldn't you say earlier?! If you lied - I'll kill you!
Everything is accurate! Everyone batten down!
My source doesn't make mistakes! Everything is accurate!
Yes, everything is correct! No doubts!
Don't believe - walk. What should I put on your grave?
I'll drink for the peace of the non-believers later.
Repeated measurements showed that the warning was premature...
Equipment didn't give confirmation... Sorry, guys.
Well, you are a blabbermouth, damn it! I almost wet my pants.
Geez! I almost gave birth to a hedgehog while running to the shelter.
Why are you messing with people's brains then?
Freak, damn it! What are you doing, bastard!?
Goat, damn it! Will bury you when I see you!
Ah you infection! Will bury you at first meeting!
May zombies tear you apart! Why are you mocking people, freak?!
Well, seem to be alive. People, how are you?
Almost kicked the bucket... Got lucky...
Thought it was the end for me... But no! I am alive! Still gonna fight!
, thank the Zone that it spared you.
, damn... And I got clipped... Won't last long without a medkit...
, and when is the next one? Not aware?
, say "thank you" to the Zone for leaving you alive.
, now understood what it's like? That's right!
at the Cordon, near the tunnel with "Electros"
at the Cordon, near the collapsed bridge
at the Cordon, near the rusty locomotive
at the Garbage, near the hangar
at Agroprom, near the Research Institute
not far from the Dark Valley
not far from the Army Warehouses
not far from the abandoned village
near the water tower in the abandoned village
before the water tower in the village
not far from the water tower in the abandoned village
next to the old water tower
by the water tower in the village
near the entrance to the "Freedom" base
next to the entrance to the "Freedom" base
not far from the scientists' camp
near the entrance to the "Yantar" factory building
close to the gates of the "Yantar" factory
a pack of blind dogs appeared.
a pack of mad dogs appeared.
many new anomalies appeared. Watch out!
a pack of mad pseudodogs appeared.
a huge pack of dogs appeared.
a huge pack of blind dogs appeared.
a huge pack of mad dogs appeared.
a controller appeared, bitch. Whoever is nearby, watch out!
a pack of mad boars appeared.
a military helicopter flew by. Probably started a new raid...
a military helicopter flew by. Strafed someone with a machine gun and left. Be on alert.
saw a military helicopter. Flew north.
heard military chatter, they are planning a large raid in several areas. Be on alert.
heard military chatter, they are planning another raid at Agroprom. As always, it will fail, but you still shouldn't meddle there.
the military, faggots, started sweeping the area. Don't go there.
saw a pack of tushkanos, don't go there.
a snork almost strangled me, barely fought it off.
seems I saw a zombie. Possibly a controller nearby.
vaguely saw some ghostly creature. Doesn't look like a bloodsucker. Lots of filth around...
there was a firefight with bandits.
a sniper shot at me. Careful there.
there was a wave of mutants, barely fought them off. Killed two of ours.
mutants attacked, somehow killed them all.
saw a mangled corpse. Was afraid to get closer, possibly an anomaly there.
saw a dried-up, sucked-out corpse. Possibly a bloodsucker lair nearby.
heard a terrible scream. Damn, better not go there...
saw something dragging a bloody stalker along the ground. Bloodsucker?
saw a pack of dogs, dragging a stalker into bushes. Careful there.
there was a firefight with bandits, laid them all down.
ran into a military patrol, had to lay them all down. Advise not to meddle here, surely a raid will follow.
ran into a military patrol. Turned out to be slow-witted, had to shoot them. Don't advise appearing there, most likely a raid will follow.
saw a snork tear apart a stalker with my own eyes. Damn, how much filth is here...
Guys... Anyone have vodka or alcohol?
Got hit hard today... Tears the soul out.
It feels so lousy... To the point of vomiting...
Feel like we'll miss someone today - it hits the brain too hard.
Guys, need to endure. As soon as it subsides - run for artifacts. Should be plenty now. Who's with me?
My buddy just got zombified... Motherf**ker! Told the idiot - be careful! Shot him... Now I want to hang myself...
It's okay, at least I'll gather fresh artifacts.
Screw this Zone with all its artifacts, if one has to endure this!
What is wrong with the network?!
People, so, it's dawning - think we can move out already, won't run into much now, not like at night.
Dawn has broken. Moving out, it's more or less safe now.
Guys, wake up! It's morning already!
Eh, guys! Finally getting light, I'm tired of trembling with fear in the dark. Better to tremble... in the light of day...
Can anyone hear me? A group of our guys went missing last night. Were supposed to return by morning from Agroprom. Still not here. We are setting out for a search in an hour. Join us.
Damn, who invented morning... We drank all night... Cook, the bastard, brought fake vodka from somewhere again... "Freedom", sleep on... the raid on "Duty" base can wait...
Guys, you should see the sunrise here at Yantar. It's something... Both scary and beautiful... And snork corpses drift so coolly in the lake surface sparkling in the morning sun... Romance...
Well, the night has passed. And I'm still alive!
Night is over. Hello, new day!
Thank God! Sun is rising! Still gonna fight!
Hi, people! Good morning, country! Ha-ha!
Da-a-amn... M-m-m... People, anyone got brine to fix health?
Holy cow! Filya! What did you put in the joint last night!? Head is splitting!
What? Already morning, yeah? And where did everyone go?
Damn, guys, do what you want, but I'm not going for loot today anymore. Night is coming soon...
Nah, I'm not going anywhere anymore. It's late, all sorts of filth will crawl out soon...
Right, sunset already... start returning slowly, it's unsafe in the Zone now.
Go on, guys... into the night... against bloodsuckers... alone. Daredevils, damn.
Well? Who's coming with me to take down a pack of pseudodogs? I'm afraid to sleep in the tent at night, what if that... dark one... asks for water again... Better to wander somewhere...
Moon will rise soon... Damn, not making it to the camp... Guys, anyone nearby? I feel some beast is already stalking me.
Attention everyone! Scientists report suspicious mutant activity at Yantar tonight. Everyone stay in camps.
Another day passed. And I'm still alive. That's good.
Day is ending, and loot is next to nothing. Scary to go into the night... Anyone else going?
Guys! Anyone nearby? To wait out the night in company.
Loner stalkers! Come join us! Let's spend the night together!
Who knows a place to sleep at Yantar? Tell me! First time here!
Ended up at Yantar at nightfall again...
Don't know about others, but I'm gonna guzzle vodka tonight.
Brothers! Help out! Some beast is chasing me! Won't make it till morning!
Critical connection protocol error. Reconnecting to server...
Connection error. Place device in reliable reception zone and retry.
Incoming message received with error. Retry.
Remote server did not respond in time. Reconnecting to server...
Critical error. Not enough of memory. System is now reboot...
Critical error. Reconnecting to the server...
Yura kicked the bucket again! Good sign.
Semetsky popped his clogs? Means the raid will be successful!
Semetsky is dying often... Maybe warning us?
So-o-o. I'll go on a raid. Hopefully Semetsky died again for a reason.
Is it true that when Semetsky dies - it's for luck?
Heh! Time to quit drinking vodka and go for artifacts. Who's with me?
Help! Where can I hide here?
Guys, tell me, where is the nearest shelter? I'm here for the first time.
Well, that's it... I'm done for...
Mother! Not making it! Where to hide here?
Dedicated communication channel lost. Presence in the designated area impossible. Requesting urgent evacuation.
Get us out of here! Urgent! Connection already failing!
Cannot take cover on our own. Equipment breaking down. Requesting urgent evacuation!
No shelters in the designated area! Get us out faster!
Base! Mother! Get us out of here urgently! Dedicated line dropped already!
Mayday! Mayday! Requesting urgent evacuation! Mission failed!
Get us out faster! Damn! Urgent! Equipment breaking down! We are packing up! Waiting for transport!
We are leaving the point. Nowhere to hide! Requesting transport for evacuation!
Damn! Base! What freak came up with starting this before an Emission?! Get us out! Faster!
No shelters observed nearby. Gear does not allow waiting "in the field". Get us out! Urgent!
, don't panic. There is a place not far from you where you can wait. Catch the coordinates...
! Calm down. There is a shelter near you. Here are the coordinates...
, no panic. If you run well, you'll make it to the shelter. Here are the coordinates...
, listen, send your coordinates so I know where to go for loot later. Ha-ha-ha.
, sorry, but I can't help with anything. Good luck to you.
no panic! Transport is on the way. Wait.
calmly! Vehicle already left. Move towards it.
help is coming. Move to the evacuation point.
board will arrive at reserve evacuation point in a minute. Run there.
run to the evacuation point! Transport will be there in 2 minutes.
sorry, but there is no one to get you out anymore. Act at your own discretion. Zone keep you...
sorry, but there will be no evacuation. Transport destroyed. God keep you...
no evacuation. Crew died. Act according to situation. Good luck.
evacuation cancelled. Transport cannot break through to you. Act yourselves.
board didn't get through to you - strong anomalous fields. Cannot help you.
Faster! We are moving towards you.
Let's move! We are waiting at the point.
Mother! Faster! We are at the point!
Mother! What are you doing, freaks! Nowhere to hide here!
May the Zone devour you! Come up with something! WE ARE DYING!
Well, maybe we'll meet again... I'll remind you of everything then!
Mother! We'll try to get out ourselves. But no chances...
May zombies tear you apart! What to do! We won't handle it!
I heard Cook has interesting magazines with girls...
And Miser, they say, has tapes...
Listen, guys, go to your subnet and chatter there. Don't litter the air. By the way... Does Cook really have something?
Geez! Someone got turned into a zombie again...
Damn... Someone finish off the poor guy!
Understood. Means the weed was good.
, don't forget! We go to that laboratory tomorrow! You know where to find me.
Damn... Alright, so be it - we go. But I feel this is no good.
People, someone offering me a cool gun here... Suspiciously cheap. What do you think - take it?
, sucker! That's an ancient scam. Someone always wants to fob off something to someone. And your money goes bye-bye.
Really? Thanks for warning. Will be more careful next time.
Who knows how to find the Swamp Doctor?
Well, why? Want to get healed...
Yeah right, tell me. But if you really need him, he appears in the bar rarely. Ask around there.
How many times to say! I don't know where he lives. And no one knows. And even if I knew - wouldn't say.
Oh... Guys, help out! I think I broke my leg. Won't crawl to the camp...
How did you manage that... where are you now?
At the swamps, near the flooded village.
, understood, I'm here, nearby. Coming now.
, hurry up - I feel bad. Afraid I'll pass out... And something is rustling in the bushes too, creepy...
People, why are there no women in the Zone, huh?
Oh, trees! Better shut up! Don't rub it in...
People, tell me... Found a thing here. Looks like a cobble, but kinda strange. And radioactive. What is this crap? Anyone knows?
, congratulations. You found a radioactive cobble.
, what are you feeding me? Think I can't distinguish a flower from shit?
, stop spreading demagoguery here! Drag your stone to the nerds at "Yantar". They'll figure it out.
People, are there really no women in the Zone at all, huh?
Go to Miser at Army Warehouses, maybe he'll spare one from the warehouse... Rubber one! :)
Guys, I found a crap here... Cobble like a cobble - nothing remarkable, not radioactive... However, glows slightly from inside and weighs almost nothing. Anyone seen this? Not dangerous?
, no, haven't seen. First time hearing.
Clear. Thanks anyway. Will have to haul to "Yantar", to Sakharov for identification. Hope it doesn't kill me on the way.
It's hard without women in the Zone... Maybe there are some somewhere, huh?
Shut up finally, you horny idiot!!!
! Why react so sharply? Maybe it's really hard for me, huh?
, smash your PDA against the wall!!! Or against your head! Sick of you!
And how to communicate with you after this, huh?

Everyone! According to our info, a well-organized and armed group moves towards "Agroprom". Either mercenaries, or military stalkers. Information about this group required. Anyone knowing something - report. Won't remain in debt.
Nah... Not military stalkers. They were dropped by helicopter.
Info verified? We thought it's a squad of foreign mercenaries.

Yeah, verified. Nah... Not foreign. They clashed with goblins at the edge of swamps. Those decided to jump them, shred them and take weapons and gear. Only they got shredded themselves. Only one wounded remained. Found him in grass behind bushes.
, was he interrogated? Delivered to nearest "Duty" base? If not - execute immediately.
Don't understand. Who are you to me? You my dad, commanding what to do? I'm not in "Duty", by the way, but a free roamer. Screw you! Won't say a word to you anymore.
, apologies. Decided you are one of ours. On behalf of "Duty" command thank you for information and assistance.
You're welcome. And that wounded guy kicked the bucket in my arms.
, that guy you ordered, I wasted him. But there were difficulties. Will you increase the reward?
Come to me, we'll sort it out.
Don't play cards with Bilba - he cheats!
Why the hell did the bathhouse burn down? Wasn't heated for two years!\nAnd why did you decide I cheat?
You, bastard, only let me win once, for bait! Definitely cheating!
, you green snot! Learn to play first, then sit down to play with normal men!
, think I can't play?! Eat my feet! I'll make you eat this deck next time, freak!
What did you say?!!\nI'll bury you at meeting! Don't cross me! Will say goodbye to your head instantly!
Yeah! Right!!! Dream on! Maybe step into the arena, huh? Talk there!

Shut up both of you! Gladiators, damn!\nBilba, everyone knows you're a cardsharp. Why deny? A line would form to kill you! You can only fool green rookies who don't know yet. So don't rattle guns here and litter the air. Someone sees - PDA will be blocked. Telling you for sure.
Damn, guys... It's so beautiful around... Quiet and smooth and God's grace...
Heh... Really? Just wait till some beast crawls out of bushes, grabs your ass - you'll sing differently.
Yes. Exactly. Relaxed too much. Tired, probably...
People, anyone got coffee to spare?
Well... Just in case... Maybe someone has...
Boar, I am Squirrel. Coming after you.
Squirrel, I am Boar. Why coming after me?
Squirrel, didn't understand. Who is Polecat?
Boar, you are a woodpecker, understood?!
Understood. I am Woodpecker. You are Squirrel. Who is Polecat - didn't understand.
Boar, b!tch, you f**ked everyone off! Walk silently. Over!
Who the hell knows. Can't understand these Freedomers.

A stalker found an orange on the field,
And didn't notice a good "springboard",
He took out a knife, wanted to eat it,
Legs were found six kilometers away.

Apparently, miser - pity money for canned food.
Better this way:
Stalker saw a tomato on a spruce,-
"H, what a dumb controller!"

Stalker climbed a tree from monsters
Grandpa-zombie raised a sawed-off...
Shot rang out and zombie fell -
Stalker pulled his Mauser first.
Come on. More! At least laugh before the end...

Stalker ran to Pripyat from zombies,
He walks faster and faster,
Pripyat ended, and at CNPP
Death came to visit him quickly.
So what? Not funny at all.
Guys, anyone knows what's happening outside the Zone perimeter now?
Wow, curious one! Go to military at Cordon – they'll tell you all the news!
Guys, heard? They say Sidorovich decided to publish a newspaper – called "Zone Herald". And pays nicely for news!
Lying, probably? Sidorovich?! To someone?! Paid for some crap?! You are a dreamer!
Eh, youth...! Live a couple weeks in the Zone, then you'll know...
People, I bought some beacons from Sidorovich with a discount, but what to do with them - who knows. Maybe someone can tell?
Damn, didn't have brains to ask for instructions? Who doesn't come to the Zone...
Guys, who is from Cordon recently – how is Sidorovich there? Haven't heard about him for a long time.
What would happen to him, that huckster!? Everything as usual - alive and well, ripping off rookies, selling them junk... Nothing new...
Guys, I urgently need the Swamp Doctor! Who knows how to find him?
No laughing! I'm scared... The Zone is joking with me again - walking at night, admiring full moon, yawned, closed eyes, open eyes – no moon!!! Cre-e-e-epy!!
People! I'm in shock! What weirdos you meet in the Zone – just saw a psycho at destroyed bridge dragging a caterpillar track from a bulldozer!!!
, seriously?! Need to go look at this clown...
Guys! Anyone found a PDA? Seems I drank too much at the bar yesterday and lost it.
And corner chewed on one side?
Guys! Can't get to Sidorovich! Knocked, knocked - deaf as in a tank! Did something happen?
Nah! He is fine, just some specialist installed a tricky lock, and Sidorovich can't master it yet. So wait.
Yeah? And how long to wait?
Heh! Until he opens or until you get tired waiting - up to you.
Guys! Got a piece of lard by chance, maybe someone has an onion?
Maybe I have, but what's in it for me?
And I have vodka and bread, maybe for three?
Agreed. Meeting at 23:00 at the bar.
Guys! Some suspicious type hanging around "Zaporozhets", maybe scare him off?
How to say... Man is kinda strange – weird face, barefoot, and clothes only jeans...
, one of two – you are either an idiot, or lucky!!! In any case run far from him, before he noticed! And God forbid you meet him again!
Guys! Maybe someone has fishing line and hooks by chance?
Are you crazy or smoked too much weed? Where is fish here?
Maybe no fish, but walked past a swamp now, and wanted to sit on the bank with a rod so much... Would give "Soul" for tackle...
Well yes, well yes... Only if you cook soup later, don't forget to season with antirad, fisherman, damn...
E-e-eh! Would like to ride a bike now, remember childhood... By the way, who knows where to get one?
Sidorovich, for good money, couldn't get something?! You know him poorly!
Guys!!! I saw a naked woman today!!!
In the bar, on a picture.
at the Cordon, near the tunnel with "Electros"
at the Cordon, near the collapsed bridge
at the Cordon, near the rusty locomotive
at the Garbage, near the hangar
at Agroprom, near the Research Institute
not far from the Dark Valley
not far from the Army Warehouses
not far from the abandoned village
near the water tower in the abandoned village
before the water tower in the village
not far from the water tower in the abandoned village
next to the old water tower
by the water tower in the village
near the entrance to the "Freedom" base
next to the entrance to the "Freedom" base
not far from the scientists' camp
near the entrance to the "Yantar" factory building
close to the gates of the "Yantar" factory
Yura kicked the bucket again! Good sign."
Semetsky popped his clogs? Means the raid will be successful!
Semetsky is dying often... Maybe warning us?
So-o-o. I'll go on a raid. Hopefully Semetsky died again for a reason. Maybe I'll find an artifact.
Is it true that when Semetsky dies - it's for luck and you can find an artifact?
